content.text: Match ends, Nice 1, Lazio 3.
Second Half ends, Nice 1, Lazio 3.
Goal!  Nice 1, Lazio 3. Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio) header from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Luis Alberto with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Lazio. Conceded by Dante.
Substitution, Nice. Bassem Srarfi replaces Christophe Jallet.
Foul by Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio).
Remi Walter (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mario Balotelli (Nice).
Bastos (Lazio) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Luiz Felipe (Lazio) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Mario Balotelli (Nice) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luiz Felipe (Lazio).
Attempt missed. Alessandro Murgia (Lazio) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Sergej Milinkovic-Savic with a cross.
Foul by Marlon Santos (Nice).
Ciro Immobile (Lazio) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Lazio. Luis Alberto tries a through ball, but Senad Lulic is caught offside.
Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Remi Walter (Nice).
Attempt saved. Alassane Pléa (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Patrick Burner.
Attempt saved. Remi Walter (Nice) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Wesley Sneijder.
Wesley Sneijder (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lucas Leiva (Lazio).
Attempt blocked. Patric (Lazio) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergej Milinkovic-Savic.
Nampalys Mendy (Nice) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Alessandro Murgia (Lazio) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nampalys Mendy (Nice).
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Maxime Le Marchand.
Substitution, Lazio. Lucas Leiva replaces Felipe Caicedo.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left from a direct free kick.
Substitution, Nice. Alassane Pléa replaces Pierre Lees-Melou.
Mario Balotelli (Nice) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luiz Felipe (Lazio).
Attempt saved. Ciro Immobile (Lazio) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Luis Alberto.
Attempt blocked. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pierre Lees-Melou.
Goal!  Nice 1, Lazio 2. Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Felipe Caicedo.
Senad Lulic (Lazio) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Patrick Burner (Nice).
Offside, Lazio. Sergej Milinkovic-Savic tries a through ball, but Ciro Immobile is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Christophe Jallet.
Attempt missed. Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Felipe Caicedo.
Substitution, Lazio. Luis Alberto replaces Davide Di Gennaro.
Substitution, Lazio. Ciro Immobile replaces Nani.
Alessandro Murgia (Lazio) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wesley Sneijder (Nice).
Attempt saved. Wesley Sneijder (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Mario Balotelli.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) left footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Pierre Lees-Melou.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Patrick Burner (Nice) because of an injury.
Attempt blocked. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Wesley Sneijder.
Attempt missed. Wesley Sneijder (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Patrick Burner.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right.
Second Half begins Nice 1, Lazio 1.
First Half ends, Nice 1, Lazio 1.
Attempt blocked. Nani (Lazio) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergej Milinkovic-Savic.
Attempt blocked. Remi Walter (Nice) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Foul by Stefan Radu (Lazio).
Mario Balotelli (Nice) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Davide Di Gennaro (Lazio) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Patric.
Pierre Lees-Melou (Nice) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Senad Lulic (Lazio).
Attempt missed. Stefan Radu (Lazio) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is just a bit too high following a set piece situation.
Attempt saved. Nani (Lazio) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Davide Di Gennaro.
Foul by Mario Balotelli (Nice).
Davide Di Gennaro (Lazio) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Lazio. Sergej Milinkovic-Savic tries a through ball, but Nani is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Patric (Lazio) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right following a set piece situation.
Senad Lulic (Lazio) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Pierre Lees-Melou (Nice).
Foul by Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio).
Nampalys Mendy (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Lazio. Bastos tries a through ball, but Sergej Milinkovic-Savic is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Pierre Lees-Melou.
Attempt missed. Patric (Lazio) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sergej Milinkovic-Savic.
Foul by Nani (Lazio).
Pierre Lees-Melou (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Nice. Conceded by Luiz Felipe.
Attempt missed. Davide Di Gennaro (Lazio) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Senad Lulic (Lazio) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Patrick Burner (Nice).
Corner,  Nice. Conceded by Felipe Caicedo.
Attempt blocked. Wesley Sneijder (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Wesley Sneijder (Nice) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Davide Di Gennaro (Lazio).
Goal!  Nice 1, Lazio 1. Felipe Caicedo (Lazio) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sergej Milinkovic-Savic with a headed pass.
Goal!  Nice 1, Lazio 0. Mario Balotelli (Nice) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Wesley Sneijder.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
